titleStmt.title: Two sermons preached at the meeting of the council of George Heriot's hospital at Edinburgh
titleStmt.author: Rule, Gilbert, 1629?-1701.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Gilbert Rule. cf. NUC pre-1956.
Imperfect: Lacks the second sermon (by George Meldrum).
